Room.Name: Khallazar's Front Door
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing at the front door to Khallazar's home on a rope canopy.
Room.LongDescription: There is a bounce to your step as you walk on the criss-crossed ropes and survey the house. A sign over the door proclaims this to be the home of Khallazar the Alchemist. In smaller letters it says, "You bring the lead, and I'll turn it into gold for a price." You do have some lead in your inventory, don't you?
